cause.description:
the title might be a bit of on oxymoron, but oh well.
this is for all people who believe current forms of government are retarded, and people need to go back to fending for themselves.
true anarchy, which is not total chaos. but also helping each other out, trading services and shit.
i know this can't happen soon. but if society changes its uber selfish ways, who know, maybe one day we will be ready. but we have to start now!
